sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Box, Buttton, Text, Image, Center } from "@chakra-ui/react"

const Hero = () => {
  return (
    <Box background="#FFA8E2" w="100%" position="relative" h={["60vh","40vh"]} pb="2rem">
      <Image src="https://iconape.com/wp-content/files/zk/93042/svg/react.svg" 
        h="100%" margin="auto" mb="3rem" p="3rem" objectFit="contain" objectPosition="top"/>
      <Text position="absolute" bottom="10%" width="100%" textAlign="center" color="white" fontWeight="bold" fontSize="4rem">
        Some hero section text
      </Text>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default Hero
